speaker: char
text: H-hi. Do you do makeup here?

speaker: char
text: I’m going on a date tonight and I’d like to do something… I don’t know, something special?

speaker: char
text: I’d like to look nice. Something simple that will complement my features well?

speaker: char
text: Would you be so kind and do my makeup in the dark?

speaker: char
text: I just… I’d like to see the finished product all at once, you know?

speaker: char
text: Like… I don’t want to feel self conscious during the process, I’d much rather see just the finished product.

speaker: char
text: Thank you so much. I’m sure you’ll make me look lovely.
